text: Get Weird is the third studio album by British girl group Little Mix. It was released on 6 November 2015, through Syco Music and Columbia Records. The album is a departure from the urban sound of the group's previous album Salute (2013), and features a more dance-pop, synth-pop and R&B; sound to it. ==Critical reception== Get Weird received generally positive reviews from music critics. ==Track listing== } == Release history == List of release dates, showing region, formats, label, editions and reference Region Date Format(s) Label Edition(s) United Kingdom 6 November 2015 Syco == References == Category:2015 albums Category:Dance-pop albums Category:Synth-pop Category:R&B; albums
title: Get Weird
